item.title: Russia Jails US Reporter Evan Gershkovich For 16 Years For "Espionage"
item.description: US reporter Evan Gershkovich was sentenced by a Russian court on Friday to 16 years prison for "espionage", a verdict slammed as "despicable", "disgraceful" and a "sham" by Western governments and his employer.

item.title: Biden "Absolutely" Staying In US Presidential Race, Says His Campaign Chair
item.description: US President Joe Biden is "absolutely" staying in the race for the White House, his campaign chair said Friday, despite mounting pressure from Democratic allies to step aside over worries about his age and health.

item.title: "Decision Of Lies": Israel PM Netanyahu On World Court's Palestine Order
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said the International Court of Justice made a "decision of lies" on Friday by ruling Israel's occupation of the Palestinian territories illegal.

item.title: Israel's Occupation Of Palestinian Territory "Illegal": UN Top Court
item.description: Israel's decades-long occupation of the Palestinian territories is illegal and needs to end "as rapidly as possible", the UN's top court said Friday.

item.title: Rebranding Trump, former president recalls shooting details but avoids policy details: RNC Takeaways - The Associated Press
item.description:
1. Rebranding Trump, former president recalls shooting details but avoids policy details: RNC Takeaways  The Associated Press

item.title: UN court orders Israel to end its occupation of Palestinian territories
item.description:
International court of justice says it should leave ‘as rapidly as possible’ and make full reparations for ‘wrongful acts’

The UN’s international court of justice (ICJ) has ordered Israel to end its occupation of the Palestinian territories “as rapidly as possible” and make full reparations for its “internationally wrongful acts” in a sweeping and damning advisory opinion that says the occupation violates international law.

In a historic, albeit non-binding, opinion, the court found multiple breaches of international law by Israel including activities that amounted to apartheid.

Forcible evictions, extensive house demolitions and restrictions on residence and movement.

The transfer by Israel of settlers to the West Bank and East Jerusalem and maintenance of their presence.

Its failure to prevent or to punish attacks by settlers.

Restricting the access of the Palestinian population to water.

Israel’s use of the natural resources in the occupied Palestinian territory.

The extension of Israel’s law to the West Bank and East Jerusalem.

Continue reading...

item.title: Conspicuously absent from Republican convention was any mention of abortion
item.description:
The event’s vanishing act on abortion reflects Republican uncertainty over how to talk about a losing issue

When he took the stage four years ago at the 2020 Republican national convention, Donald Trump made sure to rail against Democrats over their support for abortion rights.

“Democrat politicians refuse to protect innocent life, and then they lecture us about morality and saving America’s soul?” Trump boomed. “Tonight, we proudly declare that all children, born and unborn, have a god-given right to life.”

Continue reading...
